name: fitness
description: This is a fitness based website

scripts.usemin: usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html  && usemin aboutus.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/aboutus.html && usemin contactus.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/contactus.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copyfonts && npm run imagemin && npm run usemin

author: Aditya Ramchandra Dalvi
